47 // Forward declaration
48 template <typename>
49 struct ExprTrait;
50 template <typename, bool>
51 class TsrExpr;
52 template <typename, bool>
53 class BlkTsrExpr;

55 struct is_aliased;
56 
57 template <typename Engine>
58 struct EngineParamOverride {
59  EngineParamOverride() : world(nullptr), pmap(), shape(nullptr) {}
60 
61  typedef
62  typename EngineTrait<Engine>::policy policy;
63  typedef typename EngineTrait<Engine>::shape_type
64  shape_type;
65  typedef typename EngineTrait<Engine>::pmap_interface
66  pmap_interface;
67 
68  World* world;
69  std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface> pmap;
70  const shape_type* shape;
71 };
72 
75 template <class E>
76 class has_array {
78  template <class U>
79  static auto __test(U* p) -> decltype(p->array(), std::true_type());
81  template <class>
82  static std::false_type __test(...);
83 
84  public:
85  static constexpr const bool value =
86  std::is_same<std::true_type, decltype(__test<E>(0))>::value;
87 };
88 
90 
92 template <typename Derived>
93 class Expr {
94  public:
95  template <typename Derived_ = Derived>
96  using engine_t = typename ExprTrait<Derived_>::engine_type;
97  template <typename Derived_ = Derived>
98  using eval_type_t = typename engine_t<Derived_>::eval_type;
99 
100  typedef Expr<Derived> Expr_;
101  typedef Derived derived_type;
102  typedef engine_t<derived_type> engine_type;
103 
104  private:
105  template <typename D>
106  friend class ExprEngine;
107 
108  typedef EngineParamOverride<engine_type>
109  override_type;
110  std::shared_ptr<override_type> override_ptr_;
111 
112  public:
117  Expr<Derived>& set_shape(typename override_type::shape_type const& shape) {
118  if (override_ptr_ != nullptr) {
119  override_ptr_->shape = &shape;
120  } else {
121  override_ptr_ = std::make_shared<override_type>();
122  override_ptr_->shape = &shape;
123  }
124  return derived();
125  }
127  Expr<Derived>& set_world(World& world) {
128  if (override_ptr_ != nullptr) {
129  override_ptr_->world = &world;
130  } else {
131  override_ptr_ = std::make_shared<override_type>();
132  override_ptr_->world = &world;
133  }
134  return derived();
135  }
137  Expr<Derived>& set_pmap(
138  const std::shared_ptr<typename override_type::pmap_interface> pmap) {
139  if (override_ptr_) {
140  override_ptr_->pmap = pmap;
141  } else {
142  override_ptr_ = std::make_shared<override_type>();
143  override_ptr_->pmap = pmap;
144  }
145  return derived();
146  }
147 
148  private:
150 
158  template <typename R, typename T, typename C, typename Op>
159  static auto eval_tile(T&& tile, const C& cast,
160  const std::shared_ptr<Op>& op) {
161  auto&& cast_tile = cast(std::forward<T>(tile));
162  return (*op)(cast_tile);
163  }
164 
166 
173  template <typename T, typename Op>
174  static auto eval_tile(T&& tile, const std::shared_ptr<Op>& op) {
175  return (*op)(std::forward<T>(tile));
176  }

188  template <
189  typename A, typename I, typename T,
190  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<typename A::value_type, T>::value &&
191  is_lazy_tile<T>::value
192 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
193  && !::TiledArray::detail::is_cuda_tile<T>::value
194 #endif
195  >::type* = nullptr>
196  void set_tile(A& array, const I& index, const Future<T>& tile) const {
197  array.set(index, array.world().taskq.add(
198  TiledArray::Cast<typename A::value_type, T>(), tile));
199  }
200 
201 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
202 
212  template <typename A, typename I, typename T,
213  typename std::enable_if<
214  !std::is_same<typename A::value_type, T>::value &&
215  is_lazy_tile<T>::value &&
216  ::TiledArray::detail::is_cuda_tile<T>::value>::type* = nullptr>
217  void set_tile(A& array, const I& index, const Future<T>& tile) const {
218  array.set(index, madness::add_cuda_task(
219  array.world(),
220  TiledArray::Cast<typename A::value_type, T>(), tile));
221  }
222 #endif

225 
232  template <typename A, typename I, typename T,
233  typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<typename A::value_type,
234  T>::value>::type* = nullptr>
235  void set_tile(A& array, const I& index, const Future<T>& tile) const {
236  array.set(index, tile);
237  }

249  template <
250  typename A, typename I, typename T, typename Op,
251  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<typename A::value_type, T>::value
252 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
253  && !::TiledArray::detail::is_cuda_tile<T>::value
254 #endif
255  >::type* = nullptr>
256  void set_tile(A& array, const I index, const Future<T>& tile,
257  const std::shared_ptr<Op>& op) const {
258  auto eval_tile_fn =
259  &Expr_::template eval_tile<typename A::value_type, const T&,
260  TiledArray::Cast<typename A::value_type, T>,
261  Op>;
262  array.set(index, array.world().taskq.add(
263  eval_tile_fn, tile,
264  TiledArray::Cast<typename A::value_type, T>(), op));
265  }
266 
267 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
268 
278  template <typename A, typename I, typename T, typename Op,
279  typename std::enable_if<
280  !std::is_same<typename A::value_type, T>::value &&
281  ::TiledArray::detail::is_cuda_tile<T>::value>::type* = nullptr>
282  void set_tile(A& array, const I index, const Future<T>& tile,
283  const std::shared_ptr<Op>& op) const {
284  auto eval_tile_fn =
285  &Expr_::template eval_tile<typename A::value_type, const T&,
286  TiledArray::Cast<typename A::value_type, T>,
287  Op>;
288  array.set(index, madness::add_cuda_task(
289  array.world(), eval_tile_fn, tile,
290  TiledArray::Cast<typename A::value_type, T>(), op));
291  }
292 #endif

306  template <
307  typename A, typename I, typename T, typename Op,
308  typename std::enable_if<std::is_same<typename A::value_type, T>::value
309 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
310  && !::TiledArray::detail::is_cuda_tile<T>::value
311 #endif
312  >::type* = nullptr>
313  void set_tile(A& array, const I index, const Future<T>& tile,
314  const std::shared_ptr<Op>& op) const {
315  auto eval_tile_fn_ptr = &Expr_::template eval_tile<const T&, Op>;
316  using fn_ptr_type = decltype(eval_tile_fn_ptr);
317  static_assert(madness::detail::function_traits<fn_ptr_type(
318  const T&, const std::shared_ptr<Op>&)>::value,
319  "ouch");
320  array.set(index, array.world().taskq.add(eval_tile_fn_ptr, tile, op));
321  }
322 
323 #ifdef TILEDARRAY_HAS_CUDA
324 
335  template <typename A, typename I, typename T, typename Op,
336  typename std::enable_if<
337  std::is_same<typename A::value_type, T>::value&& ::TiledArray::
338  detail::is_cuda_tile<T>::value>::type* = nullptr>
339  void set_tile(A& array, const I index, const Future<T>& tile,
340  const std::shared_ptr<Op>& op) const {
341  auto eval_tile_fn_ptr = &Expr_::template eval_tile<const T&, Op>;
342  using fn_ptr_type = decltype(eval_tile_fn_ptr);
343  static_assert(madness::detail::function_traits<fn_ptr_type(
344  const T&, const std::shared_ptr<Op>&)>::value,
345  "ouch");
346  array.set(index, madness::add_cuda_task(array.world(), eval_tile_fn_ptr,
347  tile, op));
348  }
349 #endif
350 
351  public:
352  // Compiler generated functions
353  Expr() = default;
354  Expr(const Expr_&) = default;
355  Expr(Expr_&&) = default;
356  ~Expr() = default;
357  Expr_& operator=(const Expr_&) = delete;
358  Expr_& operator=(Expr_&&) = delete;
359 
361  derived_type& derived() { return *static_cast<derived_type*>(this); }
362 
364  const derived_type& derived() const {
365  return *static_cast<const derived_type*>(this);
366  }
367 
369 
376  template <typename A, bool Alias>
377  void eval_to(TsrExpr<A, Alias>& tsr) const {
378  static_assert(!is_lazy_tile<typename A::value_type>::value,
379  "Assignment to an array of lazy tiles is not supported.");
380 
381  // Get the target world
382  // 1. result's world is assigned, use it
383  // 2. if this expression's world was assigned by set_world(), use it
384  // 3. otherwise revert to the TA default for the MADNESS world
385  const auto has_set_world = override_ptr_ && override_ptr_->world;
386  World& world = (tsr.array().is_initialized()
387  ? tsr.array().world()
388  : (has_set_world ? *override_ptr_->world
389  : TiledArray::get_default_world()));
390 
391  // Get the output process map.
392  // If result's pmap is assigned use it as the initial guess
393  // it will be assigned in engine.init
394  std::shared_ptr<typename TsrExpr<A, Alias>::array_type::pmap_interface>
395  pmap;
396  if (tsr.array().is_initialized()) pmap = tsr.array().pmap();
397 
398  // Get result variable list.
399  VariableList target_vars(tsr.vars());
400 
401  // Construct the expression engine
402  engine_type engine(derived());
403  engine.init(world, pmap, target_vars);
404 
405  // Create the distributed evaluator from this expression
406  typename engine_type::dist_eval_type dist_eval = engine.make_dist_eval();
407  dist_eval.eval();
408 
409  // Create the result array
410  A result(dist_eval.world(), dist_eval.trange(), dist_eval.shape(),
411  dist_eval.pmap());
412 
413  // Move the data from dist_eval into the result array. There is no
414  // communication in this step.
415  for (const auto index : *dist_eval.pmap()) {
416  if (!dist_eval.is_zero(index))
417  set_tile(result, index, dist_eval.get(index));
418  }
419 
420  // Wait for child expressions of dist_eval
421  dist_eval.wait();
422  // Swap the new array with the result array object.
423  result.swap(tsr.array());
424  }
425 
427 
434  template <typename A, bool Alias>
435  void eval_to(BlkTsrExpr<A, Alias>& tsr) const {
436  typedef TiledArray::detail::Shift<
437  typename std::decay<A>::type::value_type,
438  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type,
439  EngineTrait<engine_type>::consumable>
440  shift_op_type;
441  typedef TiledArray::detail::UnaryWrapper<shift_op_type> op_type;
442  static_assert(!is_lazy_tile<typename A::value_type>::value,
443  "Assignment to an array of lazy tiles is not supported.");
444 
445 #ifndef NDEBUG
446  // Check that the array has been initialized.
447  if (!tsr.array().is_initialized()) {
448  if (TiledArray::get_default_world().rank() == 0) {
449  TA_USER_ERROR_MESSAGE(
450  "Assignment to an uninitialized array sub-block is not supported.");
451  }
452 
453  TA_EXCEPTION(
454  "Assignment to an uninitialized array sub-block is not supported.");
455  }
456 
457  // Note: Unfortunately we cannot check that the array tiles have been
458  // set even though this is a requirement.
459 #endif // NDEBUG
460 
461  // Get the target world.
462  World& world = tsr.array().world();
463 
464  // Get the output process map.
465  std::shared_ptr<typename BlkTsrExpr<A, Alias>::array_type::pmap_interface>
466  pmap;
467 
468  // Get result variable list.
469  VariableList target_vars(tsr.vars());
470 
471  // Construct the expression engine
472  engine_type engine(derived());
473  engine.init(world, pmap, target_vars);
474 
475  // Create the distributed evaluator from this expression
476  typename engine_type::dist_eval_type dist_eval = engine.make_dist_eval();
477  dist_eval.eval();
478 
479  // Create the result array
480  A result(world, tsr.array().trange(),
481  tsr.array().shape().update_block(
482  tsr.lower_bound(), tsr.upper_bound(), dist_eval.shape()),
483  tsr.array().pmap());
484 
485  // NOTE: The tiles from the original array and the sub-block are copied
486  // in two separate steps because the two tensors have different data
487  // distribution.
488 
489  // Copy tiles from the original array to the result array that are not
490  // included in the sub-block assignment. There is no communication in
491  // this step.
492  const BlockRange blk_range(tsr.array().trange().tiles_range(),
493  tsr.lower_bound(), tsr.upper_bound());
494  for (const auto index : *tsr.array().pmap()) {
495  if (!tsr.array().is_zero(index)) {
496  if (!blk_range.includes(tsr.array().trange().tiles_range().idx(index)))
497  result.set(index, tsr.array().find(index));
498  }
499  }
500 
501  // Move the data from dist_eval into the sub-block of result array.
502  // This step may involve communication when the tiles are moved from the
503  // sub-block distribution to the array distribution.
504  {
505  const std::vector<long> shift =
506  tsr.array().trange().make_tile_range(tsr.lower_bound()).lobound();
507 
508  std::shared_ptr<op_type> shift_op =
509  std::make_shared<op_type>(shift_op_type(shift));
510 
511  for (const auto index : *dist_eval.pmap()) {
512  if (!dist_eval.is_zero(index))
513  set_tile(result, blk_range.ordinal(index), dist_eval.get(index),
514  shift_op);
515  }
516  }
517 
518  // Wait for child expressions of dist_eval
519  dist_eval.wait();
520  // Swap the new array with the result array object.
521  result.swap(tsr.array());
522  }
523 
525 
528  void print(ExprOStream& os, const VariableList& target_vars) const {
529  // Construct the expression engine
530  engine_type engine(derived());
531  engine.init_vars(target_vars);
532  engine.init_struct(target_vars);
533  engine.print(os, target_vars);
534  }
535 
536  private:
537  struct ExpressionReduceTag {};
538 
539  template <typename D, typename Enabler = void>
540  struct default_world_helper {
541  default_world_helper(const D&) {}
542  World& get() const { return TiledArray::get_default_world(); }
543  };
544  template <typename D>
545  struct default_world_helper<
546  D, typename std::enable_if<has_array<D>::value>::type> {
547  default_world_helper(const D& d) : derived_(d) {}
548  World& get() const { return derived_.array().world(); }
549  const D& derived_;
550  };
551  World& default_world() const {
552  return default_world_helper<Derived>(this->derived()).get();
553  }
554 
555  public:
556  template <typename Op>
557  Future<typename Op::result_type> reduce(const Op& op, World& world) const {
558  // Typedefs
559  typedef madness::TaggedKey<madness::uniqueidT, ExpressionReduceTag>
560  key_type;
561  typedef TiledArray::math::UnaryReduceWrapper<
562  typename engine_type::value_type, Op>
563  reduction_op_type;
564 
565  // Construct the expression engine
566  engine_type engine(derived());
567  engine.init(world, std::shared_ptr<typename engine_type::pmap_interface>(),
568  VariableList());
569 
570  // Create the distributed evaluator from this expression
571  typename engine_type::dist_eval_type dist_eval = engine.make_dist_eval();
572  dist_eval.eval();
573 
574  // Create a local reduction task
575  reduction_op_type wrapped_op(op);
576  TiledArray::detail::ReduceTask<reduction_op_type> reduce_task(world,
577  wrapped_op);
578 
579  // Move the data from dist_eval into the local reduction task
580  typename engine_type::dist_eval_type::pmap_interface::const_iterator it =
581  dist_eval.pmap()->begin();
582  const typename engine_type::dist_eval_type::pmap_interface::const_iterator
583  end = dist_eval.pmap()->end();
584  for (; it != end; ++it)
585  if (!dist_eval.is_zero(*it)) reduce_task.add(dist_eval.get(*it));
586 
587  // All reduce the result of the expression
588  auto result = world.gop.all_reduce(key_type(dist_eval.id()),
589  reduce_task.submit(), op);
590  dist_eval.wait();
591  return result;
592  }
593 
594  template <typename Op>
595  Future<typename Op::result_type> reduce(const Op& op) const {
596  return reduce(op, default_world());
597  }
598 
599  template <typename D, typename Op>
600  Future<typename Op::result_type> reduce(const Expr<D>& right_expr,
601  const Op& op, World& world) const {
602  static_assert(
603  is_aliased<D>::value,
604  "no_alias() expressions are not allowed on the right-hand side of "
605  "the assignment operator.");
606 
607  // Typedefs
608  typedef madness::TaggedKey<madness::uniqueidT, ExpressionReduceTag>
609  key_type;
610  typedef TiledArray::math::BinaryReduceWrapper<
611  typename engine_type::value_type, typename D::engine_type::value_type,
612  Op>
613  reduction_op_type;
614 
615  // Evaluate this expression
616  engine_type left_engine(derived());
617  left_engine.init(world,
618  std::shared_ptr<typename engine_type::pmap_interface>(),
619  VariableList());
620 
621  // Create the distributed evaluator for this expression
622  typename engine_type::dist_eval_type left_dist_eval =
623  left_engine.make_dist_eval();
624  left_dist_eval.eval();
625 
626  // Evaluate the right-hand expression
627  typename D::engine_type right_engine(right_expr.derived());
628  right_engine.init(world, left_engine.pmap(), left_engine.vars());
629 
630  // Create the distributed evaluator for the right-hand expression
631  typename D::engine_type::dist_eval_type right_dist_eval =
632  right_engine.make_dist_eval();
633  right_dist_eval.eval();
634 
635 #ifndef NDEBUG
636  if (left_dist_eval.trange() != right_dist_eval.trange()) {
637  if (TiledArray::get_default_world().rank() == 0) {
638  TA_USER_ERROR_MESSAGE(
639  "The TiledRanges of the left- and right-hand arguments the binary "
640  "reduction are not equal:"
641  << "\n left = " << left_dist_eval.trange()
642  << "\n right = " << right_dist_eval.trange());
643  }
644 
645  TA_EXCEPTION(
646  "The TiledRange objects of a binary expression are not equal.");
647  }
648 #endif // NDEBUG
649 
650  // Create a local reduction task
651  reduction_op_type wrapped_op(op);
652  TiledArray::detail::ReducePairTask<reduction_op_type> local_reduce_task(
653  world, wrapped_op);
654 
655  // Move the data from dist_eval into the local reduction task
656  typename engine_type::dist_eval_type::pmap_interface::const_iterator it =
657  left_dist_eval.pmap()->begin();
658  const typename engine_type::dist_eval_type::pmap_interface::const_iterator
659  end = left_dist_eval.pmap()->end();
660  for (; it != end; ++it) {
661  const typename engine_type::size_type index = *it;
662  const bool left_not_zero = !left_dist_eval.is_zero(index);
663  const bool right_not_zero = !right_dist_eval.is_zero(index);
664 
665  if (left_not_zero && right_not_zero) {
666  local_reduce_task.add(left_dist_eval.get(index),
667  right_dist_eval.get(index));
668  } else {
669  if (left_not_zero) left_dist_eval.get(index);
670  if (right_not_zero) right_dist_eval.get(index);
671  }
672  }
673 
674  auto result = world.gop.all_reduce(key_type(left_dist_eval.id()),
675  local_reduce_task.submit(), op);
676  left_dist_eval.wait();
677  right_dist_eval.wait();
678  return result;
679  }
680 
681  template <typename D, typename Op>
682  Future<typename Op::result_type> reduce(const Expr<D>& right_expr,
683  const Op& op) const {
684  return reduce(right_expr, op, default_world());
685  }
686 
687  Future<typename TiledArray::TraceReduction<
688  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
689  trace(World& world) const {
690  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type value_type;
691  return reduce(TiledArray::TraceReduction<value_type>(), world);
692  }
693 
694  Future<typename TiledArray::TraceReduction<
695  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
696  trace() const {
697  return trace(default_world());
698  }
699 
700  Future<typename TiledArray::SumReduction<
701  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
702  sum(World& world) const {
703  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type value_type;
704  return reduce(TiledArray::SumReduction<value_type>(), world);
705  }
706 
707  Future<typename TiledArray::SumReduction<
708  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
709  sum() const {
710  return sum(default_world());
711  }
712 
713  Future<typename TiledArray::ProductReduction<
714  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
715  product(World& world) const {
716  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type value_type;
717  return reduce(TiledArray::ProductReduction<value_type>(), world);
718  }
719 
720  Future<typename TiledArray::ProductReduction<
721  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
722  product() const {
723  return product(default_world());
724  }
725 
726  Future<typename TiledArray::SquaredNormReduction<
727  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
728  squared_norm(World& world) const {
729  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type value_type;
730  return reduce(TiledArray::SquaredNormReduction<value_type>(), world);
731  }
732 
733  Future<typename TiledArray::SquaredNormReduction<
734  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
735  squared_norm() const {
736  return squared_norm(default_world());
737  }

739  private:
740  template <typename T>
741  static T sqrt(const T t) {
742  return std::sqrt(t);
743  }
744 
745  public:
746  Future<typename TiledArray::SquaredNormReduction<
747  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
748  norm(World& world) const {
749  return world.taskq.add(
750  Expr_::template sqrt<typename TiledArray::SquaredNormReduction<
751  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>,
752  squared_norm(world));
753  }
754  Future<typename TiledArray::SquaredNormReduction<
755  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
756  norm() const {
757  return norm(default_world());
758  }
759 
760  template <typename Derived_ = Derived>
761  std::enable_if_t<
762  TiledArray::detail::is_strictly_ordered<
763  TiledArray::detail::numeric_t<typename EngineTrait<
764  typename ExprTrait<Derived_>::engine_type>::eval_type>>::value,
765  Future<typename TiledArray::MinReduction<typename EngineTrait<
766  typename ExprTrait<Derived_>::engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>>
767  min(World& world) const {
768  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type value_type;
769  return reduce(TiledArray::MinReduction<value_type>(), world);
770  }
771

777  Future<typename TiledArray::MinReduction<typename EngineTrait<
778  typename ExprTrait<Derived_>::engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>>
779  min() const {
780  return min(default_world());

792  return reduce(TiledArray::MaxReduction<value_type>(), world);

821  abs_max(World& world) const {

823  return reduce(TiledArray::AbsMaxReduction<value_type>(), world);
824  }
825

827  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
828  abs_max() const {
829  return abs_max(default_world());
830  }
831 
832  template <typename D>
833  Future<typename TiledArray::DotReduction<
834  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type,
835  typename EngineTrait<typename D::engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
836  dot(const Expr<D>& right_expr, World& world) const {
837  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type left_value_type;
838  typedef typename EngineTrait<typename D::engine_type>::eval_type
839  right_value_type;
840  return reduce(right_expr,
841  TiledArray::DotReduction<left_value_type, right_value_type>(),
842  world);
843  }
844 
845  template <typename D>
846  Future<typename TiledArray::DotReduction<
847  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type,
848  typename EngineTrait<typename D::engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
849  dot(const Expr<D>& right_expr) const {
850  return dot(right_expr, default_world());
851  }
852 
853  template <typename D>
854  Future<typename TiledArray::InnerProductReduction<
855  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type,
856  typename EngineTrait<typename D::engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
857  inner_product(const Expr<D>& right_expr, World& world) const {
858  typedef typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type left_value_type;
859  typedef typename EngineTrait<typename D::engine_type>::eval_type
860  right_value_type;
861  return reduce(
862  right_expr,
863  TiledArray::InnerProductReduction<left_value_type, right_value_type>(),
864  world);
865  }
866 
867  template <typename D>
868  Future<typename TiledArray::InnerProductReduction<
869  typename EngineTrait<engine_type>::eval_type,
870  typename EngineTrait<typename D::engine_type>::eval_type>::result_type>
871  inner_product(const Expr<D>& right_expr) const {
872  return inner_product(right_expr, default_world());
873  }
874 
875 }; // class Expr
